metadata.title: CVE-2018-19655 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow in the find_green() function of dcraw through 9.28, as used in ufraw-batch and many other products, may allow a remote attacker to cause a control-flow hijack, denial-of-service, or unspecified other impact via a maliciously crafted raw photo file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcraw - 9.28-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcraw package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.28-2').
